preview: images/logo_color.png

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

library(mlr3website)
library(htmltools)
library(mlr3misc)
library(data.table)
library(DT)
library(mlr3pipelines)
library(mlr3proba)

content = rowwise_table(
  ~ key, ~label,
  "bagging", "Create a bagging learner",
  "branch", "Branch Between Alternative Paths",
  "greplicate", "Create Disjoint Graph Union of Copies of a Graph",
  "ovr", "Create A Graph to Perform 'One vs. Rest' classification",
  "robustify", "Robustify a learner",
  "stacking", "Create A Graph to Perform Stacking",
  "targettrafo", "Transform and Re-Transform the Target Variable",
  "survaverager", "Survival Prediction Averaging",
  "survbagging", "Survival Prediction Bagging",
  "survtoregr", "Survival to Regression Reduction Pipeline"
)


# add links
content[, key := link_keys(key, prefix = "mlr_graphs")]

setnames(content, c("Key", "Label"))
```

```{r, layout="l-body-outset"}
datatable(
  content,
  style = "bootstrap",
  escape = FALSE,
  options = list(paging = FALSE, scrollY = "60vh", scrollX = TRUE, info = FALSE),
  rownames= FALSE)
```
